## matos

An R API package for the Mid-Atlantic Acoustic Telemetry Observing System 

-   [https://matos.obrien.page](https://matos.obrien.page)

## otndo

A package to understand OTN data

## rvdat

Lightweight, low-level access to Innovasea's Fathom VDAT executable

-   [https://rvdat.obrien.page/](https://rvdat.obrien.page/)

## glatos (contributor)

A package for the Great Lakes Acoustic Telemetry Observation System

-  [https://github.com/ocean-tracking-network/glatos](https://github.com/ocean-tracking-network/glatos)

## TelemetryR **(Archived)**

An R API package for the Atlantic Cooperative Telemetry (ACT) Network
